lead_paragraph: Webb Simpson chipped in twice for birdies and shot a five-under-par 67 for a share of the second-round lead with Robert Streb at the Wells Fargo Championship in Charlotte, N.C.

headline.print_headline: Two Share Lead at Wells Fargo
headline.main: Two Share Lead at Wells Fargo

snippet: Webb Simpson chipped in twice for birdies and shot a five-under-par 67 for a share of the second-round lead with Robert Streb at the Wells Fargo Championship in Charlotte, N.C.
abstract: Webb Simpson and Robert Streb share second-round lead at Wells Fargo Championship in Charlotte, NC; other golf scores noted.
